channel.title: CVE Feed for MB Connect Line -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MB Connect Line -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-22520|2024-09-17T04:14:21.926Z -- mb%20connect%20line -- mymbconnect24
item.description: A remote, unauthenticated attacker can enumerate valid users by sending specific requests to the webservice of MB connect line mymbCONNECT24, mbCONNECT24 and Helmholz myREX24 and myREX24.virtual in all versions through v2.11.2.

item.title: CVE-2021-34580|2024-09-17T01:41:24.149Z -- mb%20connect%20line -- mymbconnect24
item.description: In mymbCONNECT24, mbCONNECT24 <= 2.9.0 an unauthenticated user can enumerate valid backend users by checking what kind of response the server sends for crafted invalid login attempts.

item.title: CVE-2021-33526|2024-09-17T01:56:14.438Z -- mb%20connect%20line -- mbdialup
item.description: In MB connect line mbDIALUP versions <= 3.9R0.0 a low privileged local attacker can send a command to the service running with NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM instructing it to execute a malicous OpenVPN configuration resulting in arbitrary code execution with the privileges of the service.
